headline: KeyCorp (KEY) Is Up 9.4% After Expanding Buybacks And Projecting Record Revenue - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In early December 2025, Holdco Asset Management publicly pressed KeyCorp to halt acquisitions, overhaul its board and leadership, and prioritize excess capital deployment into share repurchases, while KeyCorp reiterated its focus on disciplined growth and capital return. Just days later at Goldman Sachs’ U.S. Financial Services Conference, CEO Christopher Gorman outlined expectations for record revenue and detailed an US$800 million share repurchase program, sharpening the debate over how...
